bug.author: dqqcasia
bug.description: stage -1: Data Download espnet/data/MUSTC_v1.0/MUSTC_v1.0_en-de.tar.gz exists and appears to be complete. tar: You may not specify more than one '-Acdtrux', '--delete' or '--test-label' option Try 'tar --help' or 'tar --usage' for more information. local/download_and_untar.sh: error un-tarring archive espnet/data/MUSTC_v1.0/MUSTC_v1.0_en-de.tar.gz

comments.comment: Could you give us more information? Which recipe are you using? It would be better if you follow our bag report template to some extent.

Anyway, such a bug can be fixed easily for you, but it's hart for the other people without running the script. Please debug by yourself before reporting a as a bug. I recommend you writing set -x in run.sh.
